basics.name: Mohammed Elkholy
basics.label: Applied Scientist
basics.summary: I am an Applied Scientist in the Cairo Shopping team at Microsoft AI. I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the American University in Cairo with a minor in Mathematics. In my daily job I work mostly with NLU related tasks. In my own time, I like to read about AI alignment and Safety. I am open to research positions in AI alignment, safety and LLM reasoning.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Part of the Cairo shopping team. Working on NLU related projects.

publications.name: Bridging the Gap: Efficient Cross-Lingual NER in Low-Resource Financial Domain
publications.summary: We present a framework for efficient semi-supervised multilingual knowledge transfer for NER in the financial domain using semi-structured text.

publications.name: Virtual Graph Neural Networks: A Novel Approach for Building-Agnostic Indoor Positioning System
publications.summary: I present a novel approach for building agnostic indoor positioning by utilizing common salient features in varying environments using Graph Neural Networks.
